snippet.title: Double Switch - 25th Anniversary Edition | Announcement Trailer
snippet.description:
The FMV mystery is back after 25 years for PS4 & Steam.

http://www.screamingvillains.com
http://www.flashfilmworks.com

There is a killer in the Edward Arms, a mysterious mansion.  Eddie Edwards (Corey Haim), the owner of the building, needs your help to solve the mystery using a system of traps and security cameras to protect the tenants and discover the secret of the Edward Arms.

Coming 12/11/18
Developed by Screaming Villains
